1.content: Are you a boy or a girl?
1.title: Starting the story

choices: Next to a large Japanese architecture (The Hakurei shine)
In the middle of a humongus forest (Forest Of Magic)
On a endless hallway (Scarlet Devil Mansion)
11.content:
"Ugghh...my head" you groaned after you woken up and got up from a long state of unconsciousness. You remembered that you were heading home from school when suddenly, you come across a odd portal in the bushes. The portal was purple with creepy eyes inside and red ribbons on each side. After curiously approaching it, you were suddenly sucked in quickly and soon, you blacked out.

The real question remains, where are you right now?
11.title: Into the unknown...

choices: You hear someone coming this way
111.content:
You found youself in a patch of grass that all towered over you. "Wait hold on, why the hell I'm I so small?" you asked yourself as you can already tell that by just looking at these plants. You don't know where you are exactly since this place feels so unfamiliar. You navigate yourself across the grass to find out where you are.

Suddenly, you saw something huge above you. Unfortunately you can barely see what it is due to the grass blades blocking your view but you could see that it's some sort of red structure. While you tried to find a suitable spot to view this thing, you soon found yourself in a stone path. Not only you got out of the grass, but you could also see what it was.

"I don't believe this..." you said in disbelief. Right above you was an humongus torii standing at several feet (at least to you) from the ground. From what you learn about Japan, a torii is a type of structure that serves as a gateway to the Shinto shrine; acting like a transition between the mortal and spirit world in Shinto religion. You were surprised to see something like this in front of your eyes which cause you to think that you were in a gigantic version of Japan. You look ahead to see what looks like a Shinto shrine so maybe you could go and find help. Unfortunately, you have no idea if they could understand you since you are in Japan. Of course, that won't mean you could stay here any longer.

What will you do?
111.title: Shinto Shrine

choices: An old-looking brown house with vines around it
A white house that looked quite clean
A house that resembles a tall tree
112.content:
You were in a middle of a strange-looking forest and by the looks of it, the forest absolutely HUGE! However you realized that by looking at a tall flower next to you, you realized that you were absolutely tiny here. You don't know how the heck this happened, but you know you're going to need to find a safe place in order to survive.

You look around this forest for some place to be safe and possibly someone for help. Even at normal-size, you could still get easily lost in here. You trek forward to what looks like a clearing; thinking there might be something there.

Thankfully, it didn't took too long to get there (although you were forced to venture within the bushes under the trees) as you stepped onto the clearing. "Alright, let's see what's ahead." you said to yourself and look ahead.

What did you see?
112.title: Magical Forest

choices: She looks at the ground; did she see you?
1121.content:
It was a rather old-fashioned home that was brown in color and has vines covering it. You wonder who could live in place like this especially in the middle of nowhere. You make your way up to the house in hopes of trying to get help. "I know by this size, they probably wouldn't see me but I have to risk it." You said as you go.

As if life heard your plea, the door of the house opens and comes out someone. That's good, you wouldn't have to go inside and find someone there. You try to get a good look at who was the owner of the house.

The owner appears to be a young lady who resembles a witch of some sort. She has long blond hair that was covered by a stereotypical witch hat, a black and white buttoned-up dress with puffy sleeves, and black mary-jane shoes. Looking at her, you now know why there's a house in a forest. You know that witches tend to live far away from society and often in wooded areas like this so it made sense. What you don't know however is that if she's friendly or not. Witches can be either good or bad so you hope that she'll be nice enough to use her magic to turn you back to normal-size unless she has that kind of power.

You watch as the witch carries a broomstick on her hand and say "Alright, it's time for me to go." You realized that she's going somewhere else and is going to leave you behind. You could try to go and hitch a ride on her broom to get her attention along the way, but that's too dangerous. You may try to go and wait inside her house til she comes back, but you don't know how long will it take.

What will you do?
1121.title: The Witch's Home

choices: The witch felt you on her shoe
11211.content:
You weren't much of a risk taker; all you wanted to do was to get help as fast as you can. So with that, you start to run towards the giant witch in hopes that you were fast enough to grab onto her before she flies off. Somewhat lucky, the witch starts to run herself to catch some speed in order to use the broom. This could be dangerous because you could get stepped on by her shoe, but you went on anyways.

When you finally made it, you make a running leap of faith while having your eyes shut at the moment you made your jump. You have your arms opened wide to catch and grab on to something.

"AHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Did you made it?

Your arms have made contact on something smooth, but at the same time you felt yourself hovering in the air. You slowly opened your eyes to find yourself clinged to this witch's shoe while she flies through the sky on her broom. You look down and realized how high up you really are from the ground and it's almost making you sick just looking at it.

You need to go somewhere safe during the ride. You could try to climb up higher or try to go inside her shoe for shelter.

What happens next?
11211.title: A Ride With Marisa

choices: The door opens and someone comes out
1122.content:
It was a rather nice looking house that was white in color. For being in a middle of a forest, it was surprisingly clean; no vines or anything like that. The house itself was pretty small by the looks of it, but there's a small tower next to it which could be where the bedroom is located. "I bet someone could help me." You said and make your way to the house. You still don't know who even lives there but you hope that they're friendly enough to help you.

You got to the house after a long walk that almost made your legs sore. You stood below the door which towered over you, making you nervous of how small you really are compared to whoever lives here. You obliviously can't knock on the door at this size, but you could at least you could try to slip beneath the door. "It's a little painful, but I know I could do this." You said.

What happen next?
1122.title: A Clean Home

113.content:
You were totally confused at where you are at the moment. Your whole surroundings was completely red, almost the color of blood which to be honest, scared you a bit. You were standing on the middle of an enormous hallway that went on for who knows how long. The whole place reminds you of some sort of mansion as everything around here was luxurious....for something that was painted blood red. However, what really got your attention was a nearby table that towered over you, making you feel like an insect around here.

You wander forward in hopes you find some help around here or maybe some shelter around here. You don't know much about this place. All you could know was a clue in form of a painting which features a young girl with blue hair and scarlet eyes which was a little bit unsettling to you. Unfortunately, you couldn't see what's outside due to your size but you can tell that it was slowly getting dark.

Finally, you found a large door that must've lead to a room of some sort. Just to be careful, you take a peak of the outside and see were does it lead.

What did you see?
113.title: Vampire Lair

1132.content:
You saw what looks like a library; a very huge one indeed. No seriously if you were the same size as anyone around here, it'll still be as gigantic as you can expect. From this point, all you could see were the bottom part of the shelves and by this size, it'll probably take hours to reach the wall. Despite the size of the library, you decided to go there and seek someone for help or somewhere to hide. You slip underneath the door and into the enormous library.

Going to this library is like entering a large city. All the shelves towered over you like skyscrapers and floor was the streets that spread among the buildings. You walk forwards through the center space of the two shelves and can't help but feel impressed by how many books are around here. You bet that many librarians everywhere would be pretty jealous if they got wrap here and see tons of books, the structure and design, and the size of this library.

You went onward until you found youself in a clearing. Right in the center, you saw a large table full of books. That's not all you see there, you also saw someone sitting there and reading one of the books; finally you saw someone in this giant mansion.

She appears to be a young lady with long purple hair that was tied in red and blue ribbons and matching eyes. She wears a long lavender night dress and a small bonnet with a crescent moon on top. Right now, she's reading something but you aren't interested on that at the moment.

You were about to approach her when suddenly from far behind, you saw another giant girl, but this one was far more unusual than the other one. How can you tell? Well, she was in fact flying by flapping her large bat-like wings.

She has long red hair and on her head, you can make out a pair of mini-wings much like her main ones. She wears a black dress with white sleeves and a red bowtie. She has a pair of gray tights and black shoes. Just by looking at here, you can tell that she isn't human. In her arms, she's carrying books and putting them in the shelves. You guess that she's one of workers in this library.

After looking at them, you think about getting their attention or just look somewhere to hide.

What do you choose?
1132.title: Library City

choices: On a brown surface with a wide purple arch above you (on Seija Kijin's sandal)
On a red surface that curves outwards all around you (in Hoshiguma's sake dish)
115.content: You finally wake up after blacking out and you try to look around at your new location. At first it's difficult since you are regaining your sight but after a few seconds you are able to see. But you don't know where you are and you see you are located...
115.title: Other places

choices: No, you go into her mouth
1151.content:
You felt the hard floor and noticed it was a wooden floor. You don't even remember walking on the wooden floor until you felt something looming over you. It was purple arch and you were very shocked to see this, and looked around, realizing that you were shrunk down!

"Wha..what happened to me!?" You spoke with fear.

Then the ground started to shake and you turned around and saw a giant female walking toward you! The female had mid-long black hair, a white dress with arrows pointing in opposite sides. You then also noticed that the female had a horn on her forehead!

"Hehehe! I shall pull another clever pranks on those stupid mortals!!" Female spoke with grin.

She now overloomed you and was about to put the sandel in until she noticed you. You were both surprised and fearful to see a real life giantess before you.


"Huh? A human? A TINY mortal human?" Female spoke.

"Who..who're..!!"

Before you could speak more, the female picked you up and rose you up to her eyesight. Her red eyes looked at you closely as she observed you, she grinned and laughed hard as you could easily see she's no ordinary person.

"This is just amazing!! I caught an inchling, just like that princess!" Female said.

"Um..who are..you?" You asked.

She stopped laughing and looked at you.

"You don't know me? I am Kijin Seiga, an amanojyaku!" She answered.

You shivered as you never seen or heared this person before. You felt that she might do something bad and wanted to escape, but because she still holding you on, escape was not an option. You then heard seijas belly grumble and you immediately noticed her licking her lips.

"You know? We youkais do have some taste for human flesh...maybe you can ease my hunger." Seija spoke.

"What!? No! Don't!!" You screamed.

"Sorry little inchling, strong eats the weak." Seija spoke.

She lifted you up in the sky and you saw her mouth open wide. You screamed for help, but did it work?
1151.title: Greetings from amanojaku

choices: Near a large foggy lake (Misty Lake)
1153.content: Where are you at the moment?
1153.title: Somewhere else

info.brief_description: You found yourself in the realm of Gensokyo only to find it a lot bigger than you imagine.
info.description:
You get sucked into Gensokyo from the Touhou Project series at a very tiny size. Will you survive or will you end up getting yourself killed? Only one way to find out!

Rules:

1. Try to put more effort when writing a chapter and make sure it's a paragraph.

2. Use decent grammar.

3. Any fetish is allowed, but make sure they don't distant themselves from the main story.

4. The character is tiny enough to be unnoticed; however awareness is also allowed but try to get out details on how he/she get noticed.

5. The character can have any sort of personality.

6. You can end the story but don't try to do it so very soon.

7. Death is allowed but put some effort on it.

8. All the Touhou character's personalities are the same like they are (or at least how the majority the fandom often portrayed them) in the games. Don't go out of character unless there's a reason behind the changes.

9.The character is not some random fan, gamer, or anything like that. So he/she has no single knowledge about the Touhou series.

10. Have fun!!!!



06/21/2019 UPDATE:

As of this time, the story's rating has now jumped from 13+ to 18+ giving everyone the freedom to write whatever fits their style whatever they want. Any chapters with violent, sexual or other contents that are common in older rated stories are accepted without consequences.

However, there's still a few limits that you must follow. Just because you can write whatever you want does not mean there's no rules.

New Rules:

1. No extreme sexual content with underage characters.

It's so damn obvious why stuff like this should never be in the story. I don't want to see a story involving NSFW material with young characters because it's seriously messed up. So please don't go too far with this sort of stuff with the chapter involve around them.

2. No rebirthing.

I can still tolerate Insertion stuff....even if that's not my cup of tea. However, I can't really make sense with rebirthing stuff (I mean how can't you be turn into a newborn just by going inside reproductive organs) so I'm afraid this sort of stuff aren't allowed. My apologizes to all you fans out there.

3. Toilet stuff

While I'm fine with some bodily functions like sweat, boogers, and so on. However, I'm not okay with pooping, peeing and other stuff that is commonly seen on the toilet. Seriously, I'm terribly grossed out by this sort of stuff. Of course, that doesn't mean everyone can't do their business as long it happens off-screen.


So there you have it guys, go extra nuts and write what's ever in your mind ;)
